rows: The element is triggered by aThrow messageeventon the same business process diagram.

When activated, theMessagestart event initiates the event sub-process. TheMessagestart event activates its outgoing flows and enables execution of the other actions in the event sub-process. SameMessagestart event can be triggered multiple times within a process instance.
html:
Activation

The element is triggered by a Throw message event on the same business process diagram.

Execution

When activated, the Message start event initiates the event sub-process. The Message start event activates its outgoing flows and enables execution of the other actions in the event sub-process. Same Message start event can be triggered multiple times within a process instance.
